Source code for Calc_Library



[docs]def Factorial(n):
    if not isinstance(n, int):
        return "error"
    if n == 0:
        return 1
    if n < 0:
        return n * Factorial(n + 1)
    else:
        return n * Factorial(n - 1)



[docs]def SquareRoot(n):
    if n < 0:
        return "error"
    return n ** 0.5



[docs]def Power(n, p):
    number = n ** p
    number = f"{number:.10e}"
    return number



[docs]def Plus(n, p):
    x = n + p
    num_str = str(x)
    num_digits = len(num_str)
    if num_digits > 8:
        x = round(x, 5)
    return x



[docs]def Minus(n, p):
    x = n - p
    # if not x.is_integer():
    num_str = str(x)
    num_digits = len(num_str)
    if num_digits > 8:
        x = round(x, 3)
    return x



[docs]def Multiply(n, p):
    x = n * p
    num_str = str(x)
    num_digits = len(num_str)
    if num_digits > 8:
        x = round(x, 3)
    x = f"{x:.10e}"
    return x



[docs]def Divide(n, p):
    if p == 0:
        return "error"
    x = n / p
    num_str = str(x)
    num_digits = len(num_str)
    if num_digits > 8:
        x = round(x, 8)
    return x
